item.title: CISSP 2021 CAT exam experience
item.description: Considered to be the gold standard of information security certifications, CISSP has definitely gone through multiple iterations since I first heard about it a decade ago. Having recently taken and passed the CISSP 2021 Computerized Adaptive Testing (CAT) exam, here is my take on it and some resources that may be helpful in your journey. About the exam The CISSP 2021 CAT exam tests a candidate on the following 8 domains:
